title: 105: Death By Astonishment | Dennis McKenna
description:
The Rockefeller-backed medical industry launched an attack campaign against the world of natural medicines over 100 years ago and the war is still being fought on multiple fronts. One of those is the ongoing demonization of psychedelics by governments and their stooges in the corporate media.

Dennis McKenna has been on the front lines of this battle for decades as he educates the world about the healing effects and amazing insights provided by plant medicine. His new McKenna Academy will be leading the way towards a different approach to education, our relationships with each other, and how we treat this beautiful planet.

Certainly, the world could use a little cosmic healing at this time. Could psychedelics step in to fix the mess left by a dying society still clinging to what used to be, and wishing for something much better? Only time will tell...that is if time even exists at all.

Dennis McKenna website: mckenna.academy
